title: New program aims to teach minority business owners about leadership
dc:creator: WBUR
description: A new program called Pathways to Scale aims to help minority-owned businesses make it in the long term. They do this by training those owners to focus on leadership, alongside the day to day operations of running their companies. We take a look at the program.
itunes:author: WBUR
